name: mvs-3.0
description: MVS 3.0 - 차세대 기업용 통합 업무 관리 시스템

scripts.test:all: docker-compose exec backend npm run test:all
scripts.test:unit: cd msv-server && npm test && cd ../msv-frontend && npm test -- --watchAll=false
scripts.test:coverage: cd msv-server && npm run test:coverage && cd ../msv-frontend && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:clean: cd msv-server && npm run test:clean && cd ../msv-frontend && npm run test:clean
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec backend npm run db:migrate
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose exec backend npm run db:seed
scripts.backup: docker-compose exec postgres pg_dump -U mvs_user mvs_db > backup.sql

author: MVS Team
